pr_title: Add main method to Druid query runner

timeline.bodyText: The existing usage is only two places. Could you move ImmutableMap.of() to TestDruidIntegrationSmokeTest & TestDruidIntegrationSmokeTestLatest instead of adding a method?
timeline.author: ebyhr
